languages.text: "На ветеранов всегда можно положиться. Представлю старика к награде, Трон видит, он давно ее заслужил".
"You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."
languages.original_text: "На ветеранов всегда можно положиться. Представлю старика к награде, Трон видит, он давно ее заслужил".

traits.locale_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award, Throne knows he has earned it and then some."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «Siempre se puede contar con los veteranos. Haré que se condecore al anciano. Por el Trono, se lo ha ganado con creces».
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre se puede contar con los veteranos. Haré que se condecore al anciano. Por el Trono, se lo ha ganado con creces».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「ベテランは、いつでも頼りになります。この老人に賞を贈りたい。王座はこの評価のことの、それ以外にも色々と知っているのです」
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."

traits.locale_text: 「ベテランは、いつでも頼りになります。この老人に賞を贈りたい。王座はこの評価のことの、それ以外にも色々と知っているのです」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “老兵永远都靠得住，我准备给这位老兵颁发奖牌。黄金王座在上，这是他应得的，而且远不止这些。”
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."

traits.locale_text: “老兵永远都靠得住，我准备给这位老兵颁发奖牌。黄金王座在上，这是他应得的，而且远不止这些。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Auf Veteranen ist immer Verlass. Ich überreiche dem alten Mann eine Auszeichnung. Thron weiß, er hat es mehr als verdient."
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Veteranen ist immer Verlass. Ich überreiche dem alten Mann eine Auszeichnung. Thron weiß, er hat es mehr als verdient."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « On peut toujours compter sur les vétérans. Je m'assurerai qu'il soit récompensé. Le Trône sait qu'il le mérite, et bien plus encore. »
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."

traits.locale_text: « On peut toujours compter sur les vétérans. Je m'assurerai qu'il soit récompensé. Le Trône sait qu'il le mérite, et bien plus encore. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Deneyimli savaşçılara her zaman güvenebilirsiniz. İhtiyara bir ödül takdim edeceğim. Taht şahidimdir ki bunu ve daha fazlasını hak etti."
languages.original_text: "You can always count on veterans. I will present the old man with an award. Throne knows he has earned it, and then some."
